SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.lab.ca.all.parsers

Class IHAPOIHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.lab.ca.all.parsers.MEDITECHHandler
ca.openosp.openo.lab.ca.all.parsers.IHAPOIHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageHandler
public class IHAPOIHandler extends MEDITECHHandler implements MessageHandler
Authored by Colcamex Resources Inc. Sponsored by OSCARWest and OSCAR BC

The BC Interior Health Authority uses the Meditech POI (IHAPOI) to distribute labs and hospital reports to medical practices. This class extends the master Meditech Handler and overrides some of the methods that are handled differently with the IHAPOI

The Meditech handler should be adapted as much as possible in order to deal with several difference scenarios.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(String hl7Body) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Description copied from interface: MessageHandler
      Initialize the 'msg' object and any other global variables that may be needed.

      The 'msg' object should be initialized with the following code: Parser p = new PipeParser(); p.setValidationContext(new NoValidation()); msg = (ORU_R01) p.parse(hl7Body.replaceAll( "\n", "\r\n" )); - If you wish to validate the message please see the hapi documentation at 'http://hl7api.sourceforge.net/' - The replaceAll statement is necessary to ensure that the parser correctly reads the end of each line.

      Specified by:
      init in interface MessageHandler
      Overrides:
      init in class MEDITECHHandler
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception

    • isReportData

      public boolean isReportData()
      If the first OBX segment is presenting a textual report and the lab type is not in the unstructured (PATH or ITS) lab types.

    • isUnstructured

      public boolean isUnstructured()
      This is determined by a combination of the sending application and/or the diagnostic ID. Example: All IHA Radiology (IHARAD) and ADT Report (OE) sending applications are are unstructured. Only some of the LAB sending applications are unstructured. Such as BBK and MB
      Overrides:
      isUnstructured in class MEDITECHHandler

    • getOBXIdentifier

      public String getOBXIdentifier(int i, int j)
      Observation Identifier AKA LOINC code OBX 3.1 3.2. Is the name of the specific test result. L201.2800^ALT^00025570^1742-6^Alanine Aminotransferase^pCLOCD LOINC is located in number 4 of the composite.
